name: Meiofauna and nematodes from the Atacama Slope and Trench
description: The meiofaunal abundance, biomass, communitystructure and nematode diversity were investigated in relation to the spatial distribution of the potential foodsources in the Atacama trench and open slope(South Pacific Ocean).
